CustomField.description: Calculate a score of 100 for field use
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Bid_Tender_Owner_del__c),0,15)+ IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Product__c)) ,0,15)+ IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Stage__c)) ,0,5)+ IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Status__c)) ,0,15)+ IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Bid_or_Tender_Type__c)) ,0,10)+ IF(ISBLANK( Start_Date__c) ,0,10)+ IF(ISBLANK( Due_Date__c) ,0,5)+ IF(ISBLANK( Coverage_Sales_Driver__c) ,0,5)+ IF(ISBLANK( Product_Sales_Driver__c) ,0,5)+ IF(ISBLANK( Tender_renewal_date__c) ,0,5)+ IF(ISBLANK( Result_Date__c) ,0,5)+ IF(ISBLANK( Contract_Term__c) ,0,5)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If your score is less than 100, check Bid Information Missing on this page
CustomField.label: Bid Quality Score
